entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access to macOS Accessibility API breaks between running and debugging a MAUI application on Mac Catalyst #29384
  • Add method for BlazorWebView to execute JavaScript #29383
  • support Global.xaml #29380
  • Loading a resource dictionary based on a condition in MAUI9 #29377
  • dotnet restore fails with 'error getting pack version: ...' when directory name contains @-sign and target is net8.0 #29375
  • disable Unfocused Event for Entry in ListView for Android is not working. #29374
  • CarouselView ItemsLayout Not Updating at Runtime #29372
  • iOS Numeric Entry Field Lacks 'Next' Button on Keyboard #29370
  • Pattern Paint is not positioned to 0,0 when X and Y set as 0,0 #29368
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Picker loses SelectedItem after expand-collapse #29367
  • This app does not support GIF/Sticker Hybrid Blazor. #29365

Closed

  • Initial binding fails when binding to a collection of an interface #29337
  • Android TalkBack screen reader doesn't tell the user which item is selected in a .NET MAUI CollectionView #21375
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [NET10] Obsolete ` .UseMauiCompatibility()` #29006
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Converter must return a bool when binding IsVisible property #29338
  • BindableProperty doesn't work properly #29301

PullRequests

Created

  • [maui-release] Use DevDiv/Xamarin.yaml-templates #29385
  • [Android] - Fix footer scrolling issue when EmptyView is a string in CollectionView #29381
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [C] Fix typo #29379
  • [X|C] only use a single GridLengthTypeConverter #29376
  • Fix for Window dimensions not updating after device orientation changes on iOS #29373
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed Button Shadow Color Transparency Not Applied Correctly #29371
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed the App crashes when navigating to a page containing a map more than once #29369
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10.0] Removed the MessagingCenter from the RadioButtonGroup #29366
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Testing] Update failing CarouselView2 tests to use CarouselView1 in sample #29315
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Add Accessibility Selected for iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7

Updated

  • Run Categories Separately #29362
  • Setup Stage for Validating CarouselView2 #29283
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 3/n #29314
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • Fix: OnIdiom Default Value Handling for ValueType Properties #28257
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [iOS] Add a done button to text fields #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Expose DispatcherExtensions so it could be used outside of Maui as well #29259
    community ✨
  • [Android] - Fix Inconsistent Footer Scrolling Behaviour in CollectionView with EmptyView #28107
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29321
    p/0, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Enhancement] Changes in navigation events parameters #28384
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-navigation, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Improve MSBuild Error Actionability in Resizetizer #28999
    area-single-project, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    proposal/open, area-core-hosting, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [.NET 10] Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #29323
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-picker, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [iOS ]Fix for issue -> Disconnecting Map Handler causes Map to crash on second page entrance and moving to region #28795
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map
  • Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29363
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 10 #29360
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
